name: QuackWell (iGala)
description:
[🇪🇸] QuackWell es un juego de plataformas sin fin en el que, para salvar el QuackWorld en el que viven todos los patos, tendrás que intentar desarmar sin cesar el mayor número de bombas posible durante tu odisea personal por las profundidades del Pozo del Destino.

[🇬🇧] QuackWell is an endless platformer where, in order to save the QuackWorld all the ducks live in, you'll have to endlessly try to defuse as many bombs as possible during your own personal odyssey through the depths of Destiny's Well.

DREAM TEAM

  • David Moreno - Technical Designer
  • Alejandro Navaza - Technical Artist
  • Adrián Garrido - Gameplay programmer
  • Gala M. García - Gameplay programmer

OTHERS

  • Music: https://www.purple-planet.com/
  • Leaderboard (plugin UE4): http://epicleaderboard.com/

HOW TO PLAY...

... with CONTROLLER

  • Movement: Gamepad Right Thumbstick
  • Dash: Gamepad Face Button Left (Xbox: B | PS: O)
  • Confirm: Gamepad Face Button Bottom (Xbox: A | PS: X)

... with KEYBOARD

  • Movement: WASD
  • Dash: Space bar
  • Confirm: Space bar
